thread.section_title: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location but no freebies
thread.title_full: Good location but no freebies - Review of Courtyard New York Manhattan/Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Trang T
title: Good location but no freebies
text:
Being an elite Marriott member, this is the first Courtyard I stay that don't provide lobby coffee and free breakfast.
Granted that they have great location and a little larger room comparing to similar hotels. They should be aware that there are many hotels within couple blocks.
It is the wrong hotel to stay for my birthday because it is pricey for the service they provide.
